title: Colours in the Mist
description: A CURSE. A RIDDLE. A MIST.Waking up in a colourless, curse-ravaged world, eighteen-year-old Lorian finds a world teeming with magic. Flowing freely. A world she had longed for.But it isnâ€™t all as she thought. Bitter, twisted and selfish souls are those around her. As people begin to disappear, and creatures beyond her wildest nightmares creep out of the shadows. Lorian finds a small glimmer of hope in a few kind villagers.As the curse rages, the mist clouds her thoughts and riddles are spoken Lorian finds that she may have a bigger part to play in this mystery. But can she accept that she might not be able to go back to her old life? Will she see the colours hiding? And will she be ready for what is to come?
author: E.P. MacLachlan
